message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its unique value, I believe a starting price of $22,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand your perspective, Bob.  While $15,000 is a bit lower than I hoped for, I'm willing to be flexible. Could we meet somewhere around $19,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $16,500?
Bob, you're getting closer! I appreciate you working with me on this. How about we split the difference and settle at $17,750?
I appreciate your willingness to work with me, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $17,250?
